description:
2nd grader of Mihama academy, a fake tsundere with bleached blond twin tail. she has a deep interest in tsundere character and tries to act like one. Her silly and energetic personality makes her becomes the mood maker of the class. Her study is bad. She always carries with her a shark-shaped pouch which contains lemonade sweets. Despite having difficulty with sour foods, she still try to drink 100% pure Vitamin C in order to "improve her intelligence", as she said. She has encountered many bad lucks since her birth but always manages to get through them in one way or another.
Her representative fruit is the lemon.
Source: VNDB
name: Matsushima Michiru
